snippet.title: Sail of Dreams - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2721040/Sail_of_Dreams/

Follow the daydreams of a child, exploring the seas of his imagination as you brave the dangers of a pirate!
Wander the waves as you attack, board and sink ships to amass your own fortune! Will you prefer approaching the battles wearing down your opponent from a distance with powerful cannons, rush them aboard to prove your skill with the sword, or maybe some more... brutal meeting using the prow?
Test your ability to manage the various parts of a ship: sails, helm, repairs, cannons... Recruit cat sailors for your crew who will assist you in those various tasks, as long as they don't blow up something!


A solo game dev project, almost one and a half year in the making. If you want to support me, don't forget to wishlist the game on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2721040/Sail_of_Dreams/
Twitter - https://x.com/DreamDwarf
Discord Server - https://discord.gg/YSccajsysV
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/DreamDwarf
